transcript: I'm finding a way to make it work and I will go wherever you go. Whatever I have to do, I will make this work.

segments.text: I'm finding a way to make it work and I will go wherever you go. Whatever I have to do, I will make this work.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'm finding a way to make it work.  And I will go wherever you go.  Whatever I have to do, I will make this work.
